duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and execute experiments to generate therapeutic and reagent antibodies using the hybridoma platform.
Screen for potential hits using HTP platforms (ELISA/FACS).
Small scale antibody expression and purification.
Interpret data in the context of multidisciplinary project teams.
Maintain up-to-date knowledge of the latest advances in antibody discovery technologies, and contribute to the development of new and innovative approaches.
Maintain accurate and detailed laboratory notebooks, and ensure compliance with all relevant regulations and guidelines.

education_certification.credential: Master’s Degree in Cell Biology, Immunology or other related fields with a minimum of 2+ years, or Bachelor’s Degree with 5 years of relevant experience in industry (preferred) or academia and at least 1-year hands-on experience in hybridoma development.
